mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin(adminno, id, passwd, mname, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, departs, mdate, grade) VALUES(admin_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{mname},#{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2},#{departs}, sysdate, #{grade})
mapper.select: SELECT adminno, id, passwd, mname, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, departs, mdate, grade FROM admin ORDER BY adminno DESC
